intro: Cullen plumosum, commonly known as the featherleaf cullen, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is characterized by its delicate, feathery leaves that give it its common name. The plant produces small, pale yellow flowers that bloom in spring. It thrives in well-drained soils and prefers full sun to partial shade. Cullen plumosum is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and low maintenance requirements.
